The Morning After

Pyotr Petrovitch wakes up, feeling uneasy.  
The black snake of vanity gnaws at him.  

Pyotr Petrovitch: "Am I getting jaundice?"  

He checks his reflection, reassured momentarily.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: "I’ll find a better bride!"  

---
Andrey smirks at his friend’s antics.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: "What’s so funny?"  

Andrey: "Just your morning drama, my friend."  

Pyotr Petrovitch: "I shouldn’t have told you!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch grapples with his wounded vanity and irritation following an unpleasant interview, reflecting on his personal shortcomings and relationships.
